items.title: Poke Bowl*
items.description: choice of Ahi Tuna*, Salmon* or Marinated Tofu with Smashed Avocado, Sliced Cucumber, Edamame and Imitation Crab Salad with Sushi Rice, topped with Crispy Fried Onions and Togarashi Aïoli

items.title: Tempura-Battered Green Beans
items.description: served with Togarashi Aïoli

items.title: Hawaiian Platter
items.description: Choice Of Braised Kalbi Beef Short Rib or Teriyaki Chicken Thigh served with Steamed Jasmine Rice, Stir-fried Vegetables, Steamed Baby Bok Choy and Sweet Teriyaki Glaze

items.title: Island Salad
items.description: with choice of Teriyaki Chicken or Pan-seared Salmon*, Crisp Romaine Spears, Pineapple-glazed Smoked Ham, Green Papaya Slaw, Tropical Fruit Compote, Cotija Cheese, Edamame, Passion-Orange-Guava Aïoli and Crisp Fried Shallots, served with Passion Fruit Vinaigrette

items.title: Wagyu Hawaiian Cheeseburger*
items.description: Served with Grilled Pineapple, Applewood-smoked Bacon, Havarti, Sweet-and-Spicy Spread, served with choice of Sweet Potato Fries or French Fries

items.title: Swaying Palms Salad with Teriyaki Chicken
items.description: with choice of Pan-seared Salmon* or Teriyaki Chicken, Spicy Mizuna & Mache Greens, Charred Hearts of Palm, Cucumber, Cashews, Julienne Peppers, Carrots, Snow Peas and Puffed Rice Noodle, served with Sesame Vinaigrette*

items.title: Tonkotsu Ramen
items.description: Rich Pork-based Broth, Fish Cake, Wavy Noodles, Pork Belly Slices, Fresh Green Onions, Shiitake Mushrooms, Sambal, Soft-boiled Flavored Egg, Garlic Oil and Nori

items.title: Pupu Platter
items.description: Pork Gyoza, Tempura-battered Green Beans, Shrimp Tempura and spiced Dry-rub Chicken Wings, served with Togarashi Aïoli

items.description: served with Togarashi Aïoli

items.title: Chicken Tenders
items.description: Served with choice of French Fries or Sweet Potato Fries

items.title: Shrimp Tempura
items.description: served with Ponzu Dipping Sauce, Toasted Sesame, Chile Threads and Green Onions

items.title: Kālua-style Pork Nacho Poutine
items.description: Sweet Potato Fries, Togarashi Aïoli, Cotija Cheese, Cheese Sauce, Pickled Red Onion, Lime Crema and Cilantro

items.title: Pork Gyoza
items.description: Fried Pork and Vegetable Pot Stickers topped with Unagi Sauce and Bonito Flakes, served with Gochujang Aïoli

items.title: Coconut Cake
items.description: Chantilly Cream and Guava Sauce

items.title: Swaying Palms Salad
items.description: Spicy Mizuna & Mache Greens, Charred Hearts of Palm, Cucumber, Cashews, Julienne Peppers, Carrots, Snow Peas and Puffed Rice Noodle, served with Sesame Vinaigrette*

items.title: POWER Pack
items.description: Yogurt Smoothie, a Cuties® Mandarin, Carrots, and Whole-Grain "Fish" Crackers with choice of Small Lowfat Milk or Small DASANI® Bottled Water. Meets Disney Nutrition Guidelines for Complete Meals without substitutions

items.title: Chicken Teriyaki Bowl
items.description: Teriyaki Chicken Thigh served with Steamed Jasmine Rice, Broccoli, Teriyaki Sauce and a Pineapple Wedge with choice of Small Lowfat Milk or Small Dasani® Water. Meets Disney Nutrition Guidelines for Complete Meals without substitutions

items.description: served with Steamed Jasmine Rice, Broccoli, Teriyaki Sauce and a Pineapple Wedge with choice of Small Lowfat Milk or Small Dasani® Water. Meets Disney Nutrition Guidelines for Complete Meals without substitutions
